players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm clean. Bob check others."
Bob: "I'm the detective. Alice is mafioso. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Bob, thanks for the info. Alice, any alibis?"
Bob: "Bob thanks. Will watch out for Alice."
Diana: "Bob's info helps. Watch Alice, consider voting her."
You: "Looking for alibis. Bob, did you investigate anyone else?"

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "I'm clean. Bob check others."
You: "I'm the detective. Alice is mafioso. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Bob, thanks for the info. Alice, any alibis?"
You: "Bob thanks. Will watch out for Alice."
Diana: "Bob's info helps. Watch Alice, consider voting her."
Alice: "Looking for alibis. Bob, did you investigate anyone else?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Alice was arrested
